short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your current chat in a new window letting you split your conversation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fork ChatGPT is an extension that empowers you to fork any ongoing ChatGPT conversation into a new tab with just one click. By using the extension’s dedicated button in the Chrome extensions toolbar, you can explore alternate paths for the same chat, compare ideas, or branch out your discussions—without losing the original context.
Key Features:
Quick Forking: Access the "Fork" button conveniently from your Chrome extensions toolbar. Clicking it duplicates the current ChatGPT chat in a new tab.
Parallel Conversations: Create multiple branches of the same conversation to experiment, brainstorm, or refine ideas.
No Disruptions: Maintain your original conversation intact while exploring new directions in separate tabs.
Streamlined Workflow: No need to navigate through menus or copy-paste prompts—just click and fork effortlessly.
Privacy Focused: Fork ChatGPT does not track or store your chats; your data stays secure.
Who is it for?
Fork ChatGPT is perfect for anyone who uses ChatGPT regularly and wants to manage and experiment with multiple conversation paths at the same time. Whether you’re a writer, developer, or creative professional, this tool enhances your productivity.
How to Use:
Install Fork ChatGPT from the Chrome Web Store.
Open a ChatGPT conversation.
Click the Fork button located in the Chrome extensions toolbar.
Watch as a new tab opens with the same chat ready for exploration.
